fields.body: We want a fixed percentage of respectable jobs of all types with good wages and benefits for Somerville residents, from construction to permanent.
fields.title: More Local Jobs

fields.body: We want to see the creation of squares as destinations, with careful attention to mixed use of commercial/residential, reuse of buildings, and economic development to increase the tax base.
fields.title: Increase Commercial and Economic Development

fields.body: We want locally owned, culturally diverse, clean businesses in commercial areas with employees who live in Somerville.
fields.title: Keep and Add Local Businesses

fields.body: We want to make sure people of all economic means have the ability to afford housing and living costs, so that Somerville residents, such as child care workers, cab drivers, local business employees and others can stay here affordably.
fields.title: Keep Somerville Affordable

fields.body: We want to preserve and encourage economic and ethnic diversity of residents and businesses.
fields.title: Maintain Our Diversity

fields.body: We want a safe, environmentally friendly neighborhood with more green space, trees, and gardens; reduction of noise; avoidance of light pollution; and prevention of toxic chemicals in the air.
fields.title: Improve the Green Environment

fields.body: We want to encourage walking and cycling, through safe, bike/ pedestrian friendly design of streets and paths around and between stations.
fields.title: Encourage Walking and Biking

fields.body: We want both indoor and outdoor safe, public gathering spaces for community members.
fields.title: Create Community Gathering Spaces

fields.body: We want above standard, safe access to and between stations for people with disabilities, strollers, and pedestrians in general.
fields.title: Improve Access

fields.body: We want to make sure residents are included on an ongoing basis in the plan- ning, design, and zoning changes to the stations and areas around them. Youth, artists, and others should help design stations, with attention to amenities. We need an easy and clear process for residents to address problems as they come up, with ways of immediately resolving unseen impacts.
fields.title: Community Involvement

fields.body: We want to ensure inter-modal access between neighborhoods and stations, for new train service to be adequate and speedy, and for existing bus lines to continue to serve areas not connected by train.
fields.title: Connecting Buses and Trains
How To Improve Access
